front.title: MBGP Extensions For Multicast Source Reachability Via AMT

abstract.t: This document describes a BGP-based method to communicate source IP reverse-path reachability for sources of multicast IP traffic which is available via AMT (RFC 7450). This document defines a new SAFI (Subsequent Address Family Identifier) Parameter type for MBGP which declares the next hop for RPF (Reverse Path Forwarding) of a source IP to be the AMT tunnel discovered via an explicitly provided anycast IP address for AMT Relay Discovery.
